verbs.description: sf [V: shooting] leaves man with life - threatening injuries a shooting sunday in san francisco bayview neighborhood injured two people causing life - threatening injuries to one of the men authorities said around 1 30 a m sunday a 47-year - old man got into a fight with three people at third street and newcomb avenue near the bayview opera house according to san francisco police the suspects shot at the man causing severe injuries police said a second victim a 50-year - old man was also shot and suffered non - life - threatening injuries both were transported to a hospital police did not say what prompted the fight ashley mcbride is a san francisco chronicle staff writer email bay area bayview opera house san francisco fbi federal bureau of investigation man
